title: 1944년 James 사건
summary: 미국 Georgia, GA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: James. 판결일: 1944-10-07. 법원: Supreme Court of Georgia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: James v. State
**판결일**: 1944-10-07
**법원**: Supreme Court of Georgia
**관할**: Georgia, GA

**판사**: Jenkins

## 변호인

Thomas E. Dawson and Donald II. Fraser, for plaintiff in error., T. Grady Head, attorney-general, B. L. Dawson, solicitor-general, and Victor Davidson, assistant attorney-general, contra.

## 인용

- 198 Ga. 426

## 판결문 요약


Jenkins, Presiding Justice.
The defendant having been convicted of murder without recommendation, and the only exception being on the general grounds, and the evidence amply supporting the verdict, the court did not err in refusing a new trial.

Judgment affirmed.


All the Justices concur.

Thomas E. Dawson and Donald II. Fraser, for plaintiff in error.
T. Grady Head, attorney-general, B. L. Dawson, solicitor-general, and Victor Davidson, assistant attorney-general, contra.
...
